about_the_game:
After the death of your mother, your old man decided to move back to his cabin in the woods. Five years after you last heard of him, you choose to move to the cabin yourself and start searching for him. On arrival, you notice the cabin is barricaded and it looks like a fight has taken place. While you look for your old man, you hear whispers and branches cracking in the old trees.

An unpleasant feeling overcomes you, as you realise, your not alone in these woods. Someone or something is stalking you. It's hiding in the trees. Just waiting for the night to come, before it can attack. Then you acknowledge that these barricades were there for a reason and it would be wise to prepare yourself and the cabin for the upcoming attack.




  • Explore the woods and find the whereabouts of your old man
  • Barricade your cabin and survive the nightly attacks of the enemy
  • Dynamic Day/Night Cycle
  • Chop and cut trees
  • Craft woodplanks for barricading or chop chunks to lit the chimney
  • Lantern with candle which needs to be managed and replaced after a while
  • Search for and manage ammunition to fight the enemy
  • Game completely without UI (except subtitles, if activated)

content_descriptors.notes: The game could contain mildly graphic content, like corpses and blood.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-6500 3.2 GHz / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 4GB
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Prussia 1892, It's been five years since your old man mysteriously disappeared in the woods. After all this time, you decided to search for him. But after a short while, you realise that you are not alone in the woods. Something is lurking in the trees and they will hunt you by night.
